pins.name: GNSS_PULSE
pins.desc: GNSS time pulse output. Can be used for a GPS fix LED.

pins.name: TSOM_A7
pins.desc: A7 Analog in, GPIO D7, PWM, SPI SS, WKP
pins.tone: A4, A5, A5, A7 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: TSOM_A6
pins.desc: A6 Analog in, GPIO D6, PWM, SPI (SCK)
pins.tone: A4, A5, A5, A7 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: TSOM_A5
pins.desc: A5 Analog in, GPIO D5, PWM, SPI MISO
pins.tone: A4, A5, A5, A7 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: TSOM_A4
pins.desc: A4 Analog in, GPIO D4, PWM, SPI MOSI
pins.tone: A4, A5, A5, A7 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.desc: 3.3V out, 1000 mA maximum including nRF52 and other peripherals.

pins.name: RUN
pins.desc: Pull low to disable LTC7103 regulator. Has 100K pull-up to VIN.

pins.name: PGOOD
pins.desc: LTC7103 regulator open drain power good output. Pulled low when regulator is not in regulation.

pins.name: LI+
pins.desc: Connect to Li-Po battery. Can power the device or be recharged by VIN or VBUS.

pins.name: TSOM_USB_VBUS
pins.desc: nRF52 USB power input. Can be used as a 5V power supply instead of VIN.

pins.name: 5V
pins.desc: 5V power output when powered by VIN or USB

pins.name: TSOM_A2_BUTTON
pins.desc: External user button, A2 Analog in, GPIO D2, PWM
pins.tone: A0, A1, A2, A3 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: TSOM_A3_BATT_TEMP
pins.desc: Battery temperature sensor, A3 Analog in, GPIO D3, PWM
pins.tone: A0, A1, A2, A3 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: CAN_5V
pins.desc: 5V power out, 0.8A maximum. Can be controlled by software.

pins.name: RX
pins.desc: Serial1 RX, GPIO D9, PWM, Wire3 SDA
pins.tone: D8, D9 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: TX
pins.desc: Serial1 TX, GPIO D8, PWM, Wire3 SCL
pins.tone: D8, D9 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: RTC_BAT
pins.desc: RTC/Watchdog battery +. Connect to GND if not using.

pins.name: RTC_EXTI
pins.desc: RTC EXTI. Can use as a wake button. Has 100K weak pull-up to 3V3.

pins.name: RST
pins.desc: Hardware reset. Pull low to reset; can leave unconnected in normal operation.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.desc: Regulated 3.3V DC output, maximum load 500 mA

pins.name: A5
pins.desc: A5 Analog in, GPIO, PWM, Was A3 on Gen 3.

pins.name: S4
pins.desc: S4 GPIO, Was A4 on Gen 3.
pins.internalPull: 22K. No internal pull up or pull down in HIBERNATE sleep mode.

pins.name: S3
pins.desc: S3 GPIO, SPI SS, Was A5 on Gen 3.

pins.name: SCK
pins.desc: SPI SCK, D13 GPIO, S3 GPIO, Serial3 RTS
pins.serial: Serial3 (RTS)|RTS. Use Serial3 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: MOSI
pins.desc: D15 GPIO, S0 GPIO, PWM, SPI MOSI, Serial3 TX

pins.name: MISO
pins.desc: D16 GPIO, S1 GPIO, PWM, SPI MISO, Serial3 RX.

pins.name: TX
pins.boot: Low at boot triggers ISP flash download

pins.name: D0
pins.desc: D0 GPIO, I2C SDA, A3 Analog In
pins.i2c: Wire (SDA)|SDA. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor.

pins.name: D1
pins.desc: D1 GPIO, PWM, I2C SCL, A4 Analog In
pins.i2c: Wire (SCL)|SCL. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor.

pins.name: D2
pins.desc: D2 GPIO, Serial2 RTS, SPI1 MOSI
pins.serial: Serial2 (RTS)|RTS. Use Serial2 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: D3
pins.desc: D3 GPIO, Serial2 CTS, SPI1 MISO
pins.serial: Serial2 (CTS)|CTS. Use Serial2 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: D4
pins.desc: D4 GPIO, Serial2 TX, SPI1 SCK

pins.name: D5
pins.desc: D5 GPIO, Serial2 RX, SPI1 SS
pins.spi: SPI1 (SS)|SS. Use SPI1 object. Can use any pin for SPI1 SS/CS however.

pins.name: D7
pins.digitalWrite: Yes. On the Photon this is the blue D7 LED.
pins.boot: SWDIO. 40K pull-up at boot. Low at boot triggers MCU test mode.

pins.name: D10
pins.desc: D10 GPIO. Serial3 CTS, WKP. Was D8/WKP on Gen 3.
pins.serial: Serial3 (CTS)|CTS. Use Serial3 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: VUSB
pins.desc: Power out (when powered by USB) 5 VDC at 1A maximum. Power in with limitations.

pins.name: EN
pins.desc: Power supply enable. Connect to GND to power down. Has internal weak (100K) pull-up.

pins.name: LI+
pins.desc: Connected to JST PH LiPo battery connector. 3.7V in or out.

pins.name: FUEL_INT
pins.desc: FUEL_INT, interrupt from battery fuel gauge, IOEX GPA0

pins.name: SHT_ALERT
pins.desc: SHT_ALERT, alert signal from temperature sensor, IOEX GPA4

pins.name: PGOOD
pins.desc: PGOOD, DCDC power good, IOEX GPA6

pins.name: CAN_INT
pins.desc: CAN_INT, interrupt from CAN controller, IOEX GPB2

pins.name: P2_RESET
pins.desc: Hardware reset. Pull low to reset; can leave unconnected in normal operation.

pins.name: P2_MODE
pins.desc: MODE button. Pin number constant is BTN. Pull low when button is pressed.

pins.name: P2_D7_SWDIO
pins.digitalWrite: Yes. On the Photon this is the blue D7 LED.
pins.boot: SWDIO. 40K pull-up at boot. Low at boot triggers MCU test mode.

pins.name: P2_TX/D8
pins.boot: Low at boot triggers ISP flash download

pins.name: P2_D1_SCL
pins.i2c: Wire (SCL)|SCL. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor.

pins.name: P2_D0_SDA
pins.i2c: Wire (SDA)|SDA. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor.

pins.name: P2_S1_SDI
pins.desc: S1 GPIO, PWM, SPI SDI/MISO, Serial3 RX.

pins.name: P2_S0_SDO
pins.desc: S0 GPIO, PWM, SPI SDO/MOSI, Serial3 TX.

pins.name: VIN
pins.desc: Power in 3.6V to 5.5 VDC. Or power out (when powered by USB) 4.8 VDC at 1A maximum.

pins.name: GND
pins.desc: Ground. You only need to use one of the Photon ground pins.

pins.name: WKP
pins.desc: WKP/A7 Wakeup (active high), analog in, GPIO.

pins.name: DAC
pins.desc: DAC/A6 True analog out, analog in, GPIO.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D3 and DAC/A6 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: A5
pins.desc: A5 Analog in, GPIO, SPI MOSI.
pins.analogWritePWM: Yes. D2 and A5 share the same PWM channel and the PWM duty cycle is set for both.
pins.tone: Yes. D2 and A5 share the same PWM channel and only one frequency can be set for both.

pins.name: A4
pins.desc: A4 Analog in, GPIO, SPI MISO.
pins.analogWritePWM: Yes. D3 and A4 share the same PWM channel and the PWM duty cycle is set for both.
pins.tone: Yes. D3 and A4 share the same PWM channel and only one frequency can be set for both.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D1 and A4 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: A3
pins.desc: A3 True analog out, analog in, GPIO.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D2, A0, and A3 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: A2
pins.desc: A2 Analog in, GPIO, SPI SS
pins.spi: SPI (SS)|SS. Use SPI object. This is only the default SS/CS pin, you can use any GPIO instead.

pins.name: A1
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D4 and A1 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: A0
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D2, A0, and A3 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: D0
pins.i2c: Wire (SDA)|SDA. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor. Is 5V tolerant.

pins.name: D1
pins.desc: D0 GPIO, I2C SCL, CAN TX
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D1 and A4 share the same interrupt handler.
pins.i2c: Wire (SCL)|SCL. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor. Is 5V tolerant.

pins.name: D2
pins.desc: D2 GPIO, SPI1 MOSI, CAN RX
pins.analogWritePWM: Yes. D2 and A5 share the same PWM channel and the PWM duty cycle is set for both.
pins.tone: Yes. D2 and A5 share the same PWM channel and only one frequency can be set for both.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D2, A0, and A3 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: D3
pins.analogWritePWM: Yes. D3 and A4 share the same PWM channel and the PWM duty cycle is set for both.
pins.tone: Yes. D3 and A4 share the same PWM channel and only one frequency can be set for both.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D3 and DAC/A6 share the same interrupt handler.
pins.jtag: JTAG RST|JTAG RST. 40K pull-up at boot.
pins.internalPull: 40K. Pull-up applied in bootloader for JTAG.

pins.name: D4
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D4 and A1 share the same interrupt handler.
pins.jtag: JTAG TDO|JTAG TDO. Floating at boot.

pins.name: D5
pins.spi: SPI1 (SS)|SS. Use SPI1 object. Can use any pin for SPI1 SS/CS however.
pins.jtag: JTAG TDI|JTAG TDI. 40K pull-up at boot.

pins.name: D6
pins.jtag: JTAG TCK|JTAG TCK. 40K pull-down at boot.
pins.internalPull: 40K. Pull-up applied in bootloader for JTAG.

pins.name: D7
pins.digitalRead: Yes. But the on-board LED will light when 3.3V is supplied on this pin as well.
pins.digitalWrite: Yes. Note that this controls the on-board blue LED.
pins.jtag: JTAG TMS|JTAG TMS. 40K pull-up at boot.
pins.internalPull: 40K. Pull-up applied in bootloader for JTAG.

pins.name: VBAT
pins.desc: Battery for internal real-time clock, backup registers, and SRAM. Supply 1.65VDC to 3.6 VDC at 19 A..

pins.name: RST
pins.desc: Hardware reset. Pull low to reset; can leave unconnected in normal operation.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.desc: Regulated 3.3V DC output, maximum load 100 mA. Or input 3.0V to 3.6V.

pins.name: SETUP
pins.desc: SETUP button, has internal pull-up. Pin number constant is BTN.

pins.name: GND
pins.desc: Ground. Be sure you connect all P1 ground pins.

pins.name: VDDIO_3V3_WL
pins.desc: Regulated 3.3V DC power input for BCM43362.

pins.name: NC
pins.desc: No connection. Do not connect anything to this pin.

pins.name: A4
pins.analogWritePWM: Yes. D3 and A4 share the same PWM channel and the PWM duty cycle is set for both.
pins.tone: Yes. D3 and A4 share the same PWM channel and only one frequency can be set for both.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D1 and A4 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: A3
pins.desc: A3 True analog out, analog in, GPIO.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D2, A0, and A3 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: A5
pins.analogWritePWM: Yes. D2 and A5 share the same PWM channel and the PWM duty cycle is set for both.
pins.tone: Yes. D2 and A5 share the same PWM channel and only one frequency can be set for both.

pins.desc: DAC/A6 True analog out, analog in, GPIO.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D3, DAC/A6, and P1S3 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: WKP
pins.desc: WKP/A7 Wakeup (active high), analog in, GPIO.

pins.desc: Hardware reset. Pull low to reset; can leave unconnected in normal operation.

pins.name: PMID

pins.i2c: Wire (SCL)|SCL. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor. Is 5V tolerant.

pins.name: D2
pins.desc: D2 GPIO, SPI1 MOSI, CAN RX
pins.analogWritePWM: Yes. D2 and A5 share the same PWM channel and the PWM duty cycle is set for both.
pins.tone: Yes. D2 and A5 share the same PWM channel and only one frequency can be set for both.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D2, A0, and A3 share the same interrupt handler.

pins.name: D3
pins.analogWritePWM: Yes. D3 and A4 share the same PWM channel and the PWM duty cycle is set for both.
pins.tone: Yes. D3 and A4 share the same PWM channel and only one frequency can be set for both.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D3 and DAC/A6 share the same interrupt handler.
pins.jtag: JTAG RST|JTAG RST. 40K pull-up at boot.
pins.internalPull: 40K. Pull-up applied in bootloader for JTAG.

pins.name: D4
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. D4 and A1 share the same interrupt handler.
pins.jtag: JTAG TDO|JTAG TDO. Floating at boot.

pins.name: D5
pins.spi: SPI1 (SS)|SS. Use SPI1 object. Can use any pin for SPI1 SS/CS however.
pins.jtag: JTAG TDI|JTAG TDI. 40K pull-up at boot.

pins.name: D6
pins.jtag: JTAG TCK|JTAG TCK. 40K pull-down at boot.
pins.internalPull: 40K. Pull-up applied in bootloader for JTAG.

pins.name: D7
pins.digitalRead: Yes. But the on-board LED will light when 3.3V is supplied on this pin as well.
pins.digitalWrite: Yes. Note that this controls the on-board blue LED.
pins.attachInterrupt: No. Shared with BAT_INT_PC13.
pins.jtag: JTAG TMS|JTAG TMS. 40K pull-up at boot.
pins.internalPull: 40K. Pull-up applied in bootloader for JTAG.

pins.name: VBAT
pins.desc: Battery for internal real-time clock, jumpered to 3V3.

pins.name: RST
pins.desc: Hardware reset. Pull low to reset; can leave unconnected in normal operation.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.desc: Regulated 3.3V DC output, maximum load 800 mA. Cannot be used as a power input.

pins.name: RST
pins.desc: Hardware reset. Pull low to reset; can leave unconnected in normal operation.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.desc: Regulated 3.3V DC output, maximum load 1000 mA

pins.name: GNSS_RESET
pins.desc: GNSS hardware reset. Can be controlled by this pin or software.

pins.name: GNSS_PULSE
pins.desc: GNSS time pulse output. Can be used for a GPS fix LED.

pins.name: WIFI_EN
pins.desc: ESP32 enable. Can be controlled by this pin or software.

pins.name: WIFI_BOOT
pins.desc: ESP32 boot mode. Can be controlled by this pin or software.

pins.name: CELL_D+
pins.desc: Cellular modem USB interface D+. Optional.

pins.name: CELL_D-
pins.desc: Cellular modem USB interface D-. Optional.

pins.name: RGB_BLUE
pins.desc: Common anode RGB status LED, blue. Optional.

pins.name: RGB_GREEN
pins.desc: Common anode RGB status LED, green. Optional.

pins.name: RGB_RED
pins.desc: Common anode RGB status LED, red. Optional.

pins.name: RESET
pins.desc: RESET button, does not require pull-up, GND resets.

pins.name: A7
pins.desc: A7 Analog in, GPIO D7, PWM, SPI SS, WKP
pins.tone: A4, A5, A5, A7 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: A6
pins.desc: A6 Analog in, GPIO D6, PWM, SPI (SCK)
pins.tone: A4, A5, A5, A7 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: A5
pins.desc: A5 Analog in, GPIO D5, PWM, SPI MISO
pins.tone: A4, A5, A5, A7 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: A4
pins.desc: A4 Analog in, GPIO D4, PWM, SPI MOSI
pins.tone: A4, A5, A5, A7 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.desc: 3.3V out, 1000 mA maximum including nRF52 and other peripherals.

pins.name: PMID
pins.desc: PMIC power output in OTG mode.

pins.name: STAT
pins.desc: PMIC charge status indictor output. Can be used for CHRG LED.

pins.name: VBUS
pins.desc: nRF52 USB power input. Can be used as a 5V power supply instead of VIN.

pins.name: LI+
pins.desc: Connect to Li-Po battery. Can power the device or be recharged by VIN or VBUS.

pins.name: A0
pins.desc: A0 Analog in, GPIO D0, PWM, Wire SDA
pins.tone: A0, A1, A2, A3 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: A1
pins.desc: A1 Analog in, GPIO D1, PWM, Wire SCL
pins.tone: A0, A1, A2, A3 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: A2
pins.desc: A2 Analog in, GPIO D2, PWM, Serial1 CTS
pins.tone: A0, A1, A2, A3 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: A3
pins.desc: A3 Analog in, GPIO D3, PWM, Serial1 RTS
pins.tone: A0, A1, A2, A3 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: CAN_5V
pins.desc: 5V power out, 0.8A maximum. Can be controlled by software.

pins.name: RX
pins.desc: Serial1 RX, GPIO D9, PWM, Wire3 SDA
pins.tone: D8, D9 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: TX
pins.desc: Serial1 TX, GPIO D8, PWM, Wire3 SCL
pins.tone: D8, D9 must have the same frequency.
pins.attachInterrupt: Yes. You can only have 8 active interrupt pins.

pins.name: RTC_BAT
pins.desc: RTC/Watchdog battery +. Connect to GND if not using.

pins.name: RTC_BTN
pins.desc: RTC EXTI. Can use as a wake button. Has 100K weak pull-up to 3V3.

pins.name: CELL_GPS_TX
pins.desc: Cellular modem GPS serial TX data.

pins.name: CELL_GPS_RX
pins.desc: Cellular modem GPS serial TX data.

pins.name: GND
pins.desc: Ground. Be sure you connect all P1 ground pins.

pins.name: NC
pins.desc: No connection. Do not connect anything to this pin.

pins.name: D10
pins.desc: D10 GPIO, Serial 3 CTS, WKP. (Was WKP/A7 on P1.)
pins.serial: Serial3 (CTS)|CTS. Use Serial3 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: S6
pins.internalPull: 22K. No internal pull up or pull down in HIBERNATE sleep mode.

pins.name: RST
pins.desc: Hardware reset. Pull low to reset; can leave unconnected in normal operation.

pins.name: D1
pins.desc: D1 GPIO, PWM, I2C SCL, A4 Analog In
pins.i2c: Wire (SCL)|SCL. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor.

pins.name: D0
pins.desc: D0 GPIO, I2C SDA, A3 Analog In
pins.i2c: Wire (SDA)|SDA. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor.

pins.name: S0
pins.desc: S0 GPIO, PWM, SPI MOSI, Serial3 TX. (Was P1S0 on P1.)

pins.name: S1
pins.desc: S1 GPIO, PWM, SPI MISO, Serial3 RX. (Was P1S1 on P1.)

pins.name: S2
pins.desc: S2 GPIO, SPI SCK, Serial3 RTS. (Was P1S2 on P1.)
pins.serial: Serial3 (RTS)|RTS. Use Serial3 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: S3
pins.desc: S3 GPIO. (Was P1S3 on P1.), SPI SS

pins.name: D2
pins.desc: D2 GPIO, Serial2 RTS, SPI1 MOSI
pins.serial: Serial2 (RTS)|RTS. Use Serial2 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: MODE
pins.desc: MODE button. Pin number constant is BTN. External pull-up required!

pins.name: S4
pins.internalPull: 22K. No internal pull up or pull down in HIBERNATE sleep mode.

pins.name: S5
pins.internalPull: 22K. No internal pull up or pull down in HIBERNATE sleep mode

pins.name: D3
pins.desc: D3 GPIO, Serial2 CTS, SPI1 MISO
pins.serial: Serial2 (CTS)|CTS. Use Serial2 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: D4
pins.desc: D4 GPIO, Serial2 TX, SPI1 SCK

pins.name: D5
pins.desc: D5 GPIO, Serial2 RX, SPI1 SS
pins.spi: SPI1 (SS)|SS. Use SPI1 object. Can use any pin for SPI1 SS/CS however.

pins.name: D7
pins.digitalWrite: Yes. On the Photon this is the blue D7 LED.
pins.boot: SWDIO. 40K pull-up at boot. Low at boot triggers MCU test mode.

pins.name: TX
pins.boot: Low at boot triggers ISP flash download

pins.name: D10
pins.desc: D10 GPIO, Serial 3 CTS, WKP. (Was WKP/A7 on P1.)
pins.serial: Serial3 (CTS)|CTS. Use Serial3 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: S6
pins.internalPull: 22K. No internal pull up or pull down in HIBERNATE sleep mode.

pins.name: RST
pins.desc: Hardware reset. Pull low to reset; can leave unconnected in normal operation.

pins.name: D1
pins.desc: D1 GPIO, PWM, I2C SCL, A4 Analog In
pins.i2c: Wire (SCL)|SCL. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor.

pins.name: D0
pins.desc: D0 GPIO, I2C SDA, A3 Analog In
pins.i2c: Wire (SDA)|SDA. Use Wire object. Use 1.5K to 10K external pull-up resistor.

pins.name: S0
pins.desc: S0 GPIO, PWM, SPI MOSI, Serial3 TX. (Was P1S0 on P1.)

pins.name: S1
pins.desc: S1 GPIO, PWM, SPI MISO, Serial3 RX. (Was P1S1 on P1.)

pins.name: S2
pins.desc: S2 GPIO, SPI SCK, Serial3 RTS. (Was P1S2 on P1.)
pins.serial: Serial3 (RTS)|RTS. Use Serial3 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: S3
pins.desc: S3 GPIO. (Was P1S3 on P1.), SPI SS

pins.name: D2
pins.desc: D2 GPIO, Serial2 RTS, SPI1 MOSI
pins.serial: Serial2 (RTS)|RTS. Use Serial2 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: MODE
pins.desc: MODE button. Pin number constant is BTN. External pull-up required!

pins.name: S4
pins.internalPull: 22K. No internal pull up or pull down in HIBERNATE sleep mode.

pins.name: S5
pins.internalPull: 22K. No internal pull up or pull down in HIBERNATE sleep mode

pins.name: D3
pins.desc: D3 GPIO, Serial2 CTS, SPI1 MISO
pins.serial: Serial2 (CTS)|CTS. Use Serial2 object. Flow control optional.

pins.name: D4
pins.desc: D4 GPIO, Serial2 TX, SPI1 SCK

pins.name: D5
pins.desc: D5 GPIO, Serial2 RX, SPI1 SS
pins.spi: SPI1 (SS)|SS. Use SPI1 object. Can use any pin for SPI1 SS/CS however.

pins.name: D7
pins.digitalWrite: Yes. On the Photon this is the blue D7 LED.
pins.boot: SWDIO. 40K pull-up at boot. Low at boot triggers MCU test mode.

pins.name: TX
pins.boot: Low at boot triggers ISP flash download

details.label: Supports digitalRead
details.ifTrue: Yes. Supports INPUT, INPUT_PULLUP, and INPUT_PULLDOWN.

details.label: Supports digitalWrite
details.ifTrue: Yes. Use values LOW and HIGH.

details.label: Supports analogRead
details.ifTrue: Yes. Values 0 - 4095 correspond to 0 to 3.3V input. Not 5V tolerant!

details.label: Supports analogWrite (PWM)
details.ifTrue: Yes. Values 0 - 255 correspond to a duty cycle of 0 to 100 % on with a 500 Hz square wave.

details.label: Supports analogWrite (DAC)
details.ifTrue: Yes. Values 0 - 4095 correspond to an analog value of 0 to 3.3V.

details.label: Supports tone
details.ifTrue: Yes. Supports PWM square wave output with the specified frequency and a 50 % duty cycle.

details.label: Input is 5V Tolerant
details.ifTrue: Yes, as pinMode(INPUT), digital only, no pull-up or pull-down.
